privateEye-1.text: Well take a look at you. Quite the VIP with the prof, eh? So, I figure you want to ask me some questions. Ok, shoot.

responses.privateEye-2: Who are you and what's your background?
responses.privateEye-3: What's your reason for being here?

end-1.message: I could use your help. Why don't you join me?

privateEye-2.text: The name's Joseph Hide, private investigator. Born and raised in the Big Apple...that's New York in case you're not a Yankee...or into horses...or jazz music. But I digress...

responses.privateEye-3: That's quite a trip to get here. What's your reason for coming?

end-1.message: Ok, I think I could use you. Why don't you join me?

end-2.message: Sorry, I need to go. We'll talk later.

privateEye-3.text: Susan...Dr. Winthrop is an old friend of mine. So when the professor contacted me and told me she'd gone missing, I caught the first train out. If she's down there, I'll find her!

responses.privateEye-2: Yes, hopefully she's ok. And what's your background?

end-1.message: I think we can help each other. Why don't you join me?

end-2.message: Sorry, I need to go. I'll talk to you later.

privateEye-4.text: Sorry, but that's a full house you've got. Come see me when you have an opening.

responses.privateEye-6: I don't have need of you now.

privateEye-6.text: Ok, I'll be hanging around the museum if you need me again.
